description: This will take researchers who are willing to follow the infected. This will succeed because it limits the people obtaining the virus as well as lets the virus trail off.
summary: Reading along an article on CNN, I came across a technique that researchers believe will work to stop Ebola. The article said people simply track the health of the infected and then watch the health of those close around them, until the disease eventually weeds itself out. The people around are tracked and if nothing happens they are let go, but if they become infected then the process begins again. I think this idea would work as it limits the number of people that become infected and it makes the disease kill itself.
title: Following the Infected
